document.full_text: days after egypt opened its border with gaza, new restrictions have been imposed on palestinians who want to cross, and the area's hamas rulers spoke on wednesday with frustration and anger.
document.title: open border at gaza is not so open, palestinians find
lines_and_colors: days after egypt opened its border with gaza, new restrictions have been imposed on palestinians who want to cross, and the area's hamas rulers spoke on wednesday with frustration and anger.
